about.title: About Us
about.description: Flavour Feast is a place where great taste meets warm hospitality. We serve freshly prepared dishes made with high-quality ingredients, authentic flavours, and a passion for culinary excellence. Whether you're enjoying a quick bite or celebrating with family, we make sure every visit feels special.
highlights: Authentic recipes with a modern twist
Fast delivery and easy table booking

services.name: Online Food Delivery
services.description: Order your favourite dishes from home with fast and fresh delivery.

services.name: Table Booking
services.description: Book your table online and avoid waiting during peak hours.

services.name: Dine-In Experience
services.description: Enjoy delicious meals in a comfortable and family-friendly environment.

services.name: Catering Services
services.description: Perfect for small gatherings, parties, and corporate events.
